data.name: bootstrap_5_property_types_display
data.description: Shows images for various property types in a row. Remember to visit Admin > Settings > Media centre and upload images for property types (new in 10.1.2). Has optional ability to only show properties from X region and Y country. See Shortcodes page in admin area for arguments to be used with this plugin
data.change_log: v1.1 b5ptc_property_type_uids argument is now optional 1.2 shortcode updated v1.3 Markup significantly improved. v1.4 Added a new alternate template with numbers at the side. b5ptc_alternate_template option 1. v1.5 Added new carousel template. Set template option b5ptc_alternate_template to 2 v1.6 Documentation updated v1.7 Improved behavour & markup
data.author: Vince Wooll
